Mission.card_speed_desc: Ultra-fast websites that eliminate waiting and dominate Google Core Web Vitals performance indicators.

ProblemSolution.problem_desc: In Algarve, competition is fierce. If your site is slow or ugly, tourists and local clients just close the tab.
ProblemSolution.solution_point_1: Instant loading to retain every customer.
ProblemSolution.solution_point_2: Luxury Design that elevates your brand.

TechStack.title: The Power of Next.js <break></break> <highlight>Fast Websites</highlight>
TechStack.subtitle: Performance to dominate Google results. Your local business with the speed the market demands today
TechStack.ssr_desc: HTML is generated on the server and sent instantly. No 'loading spinners'. Google loves this.
TechStack.caching_desc: Your site is stored in locations worldwide (CDN). It loads as fast in London as in Lisbon.
TechStack.optimization_desc: Images are automatically resized and compressed for every device. Maximum quality, minimum weight.
TechStack.code_splitting_desc: We only load the Javascript needed for the current page. The rest stays off until needed.
TechStack.prefetching_desc: When the user hovers a link, we download the next page in the background. Transitions are instant.

Features.mobile_desc: Design that shines on any iPhone or Android.
Features.seo_desc: Dominate searches in Albufeira, Faro, or Vilamoura.
Features.autonomous_desc: Simple panel for you to change photos and prices.

Technologies.title: The End of <break></break><highlight>Slow & Obsolete</highlight> Websites
Technologies.subtitle: Web technology that guarantees speed, security, and scalability.
Technologies.nextjs_desc: The React framework for the web. Unbeatable performance, SEO ready, and serverless deployment.
Technologies.supabase_desc: Secure and scalable Postgres database. Enables real-time features (chat, notifications) and robust authentication.
Technologies.tailwind_desc: 100% custom design without the 'weight' of ready-made themes. Ensures your site is unique and ultra-light.
Technologies.typescript_desc: Safer code without errors. Ensures your application works perfectly, always.

SEOMasterclass.title: Lead the <break></break> <highlight>Ranking</highlight>
SEOMasterclass.description: Imagine Google as a blind, hurried librarian. It doesn't 'see' your site, it reads the code. If the code is messy or slow, it gets ignored.
SEOMasterclass.speed_desc: Google penalizes any site taking over 2.5s to load. Our goal is 0.5s.
SEOMasterclass.mobile_desc: Google evaluates the mobile version first. If it's not perfect, rank drops.
SEOMasterclass.structure_desc: We organize content logically so Google understands exactly what your business offers.
SEOMasterclass.authority_desc: Sites free of technical errors gain 'trust' and climb results.

Process.title: <highlight>Digital</highlight> Blueprint
Process.subtitle: Three steps. No bureaucracy. Pure results.
Process.step1_desc: We analyze your market, competitors, and current flaws. We don't guess, we measure.
Process.step2_desc: We build your infrastructure with Next.js. Luxury design and ultra-fast code.
Process.step3_desc: Deploy on global network (CDN). Immediate SEO optimization. Your business, everywhere.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked <break></break> <highlight>Questions</highlight>
FAQ.subtitle: Clear answers for informed decisions.
FAQ.q1: How long until my site is online and generating results?
FAQ.a1: A premium landing page is ready in 3 to 5 days. A professional website takes 2 to 4 weeks. We focus on delivering a high-performance asset in the shortest time possible without compromising quality.
FAQ.q2: Will my site be unique or do I risk it looking like the competition?
FAQ.a2: Forget generic templates. We design every interface from scratch for your brand, ensuring your business stands out with an exclusive, modern, and impossible-to-ignore design.
FAQ.q3: How do you ensure the site doesn't 'lag' or take forever to open on mobile?
FAQ.a3: We use Next.js and Core Web Vitals optimization to ensure instant loading. Your site will be faster than 99% of the competition, providing a perfect experience on any smartphone.
FAQ.q4: I've had bad experiences with slow sites. What makes yours different?
FAQ.a4: Most agencies use WordPress and heavy plugins. We use pure engineering with Next.js (the same technology as Netflix and TikTok). The result is a light, secure, and extremely fast site.
FAQ.q5: How will my business be found by new customers on Google?
FAQ.a5: We don't just do 'the basics'. We perform keyword research, optimize metadata, ensure immediate indexing, and configure Rich Results so your site appears with maximum prominence in searches.
FAQ.q6: Is the site focused only on being 'pretty' or will it actually convert visitors?
FAQ.a6: Beauty is the starting point, but conversion (CRO) is the goal. Every button and every line of text is strategically placed to turn curious visitors into qualified contacts.
FAQ.q7: If my business grows, can the site evolve to include new features?
FAQ.a7: Absolutely. Our code is modular and scalable. In the future, you can easily add booking systems, client areas, or e-commerce without needing to rebuild the site from scratch.
FAQ.q8: What are the real advantages of having a website for my company?
FAQ.a8: A premium website is your digital authority hub. Unlike social media, here you control 100% of the narrative, centralize contacts, improve brand value perception, and ensure you are found on Google by qualified customers 24 hours a day.
FAQ.q9: How will English or German tourists find my business?
FAQ.a9: Our professional plan includes Multilingual support (up to 4 languages) and advanced Local SEO. This means your site will be optimized to appear in searches made in English or German, capturing the market with the highest purchasing power in the Algarve.
FAQ.q10: What if I need to change a price or a photo quickly in the summer?
FAQ.a10: We know the pace in the Algarve is intense. With our Turnkey Delivery, we not only leave everything configured but also offer priority support via WhatsApp. If you don't want the hassle, our 50â‚¬ monthly management ensures changes are made by us in record time.
FAQ.q11: Will I have surprise costs with hosting or security?
FAQ.a11: Total transparency: the amounts of â‚¬350 or â‚¬650 are fixed for construction. The â‚¬50 monthly fee covers everything necessary for the site to be online, secure (SSL included), and ultra-fast. There are no hidden fees or abusive annual renewals.

Footer.slogan: Helping Algarve businesses dominate the digital world with high-performance websites and AI integration.

Consent.title: We value your privacy
Consent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, provide personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. Read our <link>Cookie Policy</link> and <linkPrivacy>Privacy Policy</linkPrivacy>.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Commitment to transparency and protection of your personal data, in full compliance with GDPR.
Privacy.summary_text: Websites Algarve values the privacy of its users. This policy details how we treat your personal data, ensuring security, confidentiality, and respect for your rights, in strict compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Privacy.section1_text: The entity responsible for data processing is Websites Algarve. Any privacy-related questions can be addressed to:
Privacy.section2_text: We collect only strictly necessary data for service operation and requested commercial communication:
Privacy.section2_li1: Identification: Name, Email, Phone (for quote management and support).
Privacy.section2_li2: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device, and approximate location (via Google Analytics, only with consent).
Privacy.section2_li3: Project Data: Information voluntarily provided about your company for consulting purposes.
Privacy.section2_li4: Marketing: Sending newsletters or promotions requires explicit consent (opt-in).
Privacy.section3_text: Personal data will be kept only for the period necessary for the purposes that motivated its collection:
Privacy.section3_li1: Contact/Client Data: Maintained as long as the commercial relationship lasts or by legal imposition (invoicing).
Privacy.section3_li2: Marketing Data: Until the user withdraws consent.
Privacy.section3_li3: Analytics Cookies: As defined in the Cookie Policy (maximum 2 years for Google Analytics).
Privacy.section4_text: Websites Algarve does not sell personal data. Sharing occurs only with verified subprocessors ensuring GDPR compliance:
Privacy.section4_li1: Google Analytics (USA): For statistical analysis (with anonymized IP).
Privacy.section4_li2: Supabase/Vercel: As secure hosting infrastructure and database.
Privacy.section5_text: We implement advanced technical measures, including SSL/TLS encryption in all communications and protected databases with strict access control.
Privacy.section6_text: Under GDPR, you have the following rights, which you can exercise freely:
Privacy.section6_li1: Access: Request a copy of the data we hold about you.
Privacy.section6_li2: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Privacy.section6_li3: Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten'): Request deletion of your data (when not conflicting with legal obligations).
Privacy.section6_li4: Portability: Receive your data in a structured format.
Privacy.section6_li5: Objection: Object to data processing for marketing purposes.
Privacy.section7_text: If you consider that your data is not being treated lawfully, you have the right to file a complaint with the National Data Protection Commission (CNPD).

Terms.title: Terms & Conditions
Terms.subtitle: Regulation of use for Websites Algarve services and digital platform.
Terms.section1_text: By accessing the website or hiring Websites Algarve services, the Client/User fully agrees to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, you must immediately cease using the platform.
Terms.section2_text: Websites Algarve provides specialized services in:
Terms.section2_li1: Web Design and Development (Websites, E-commerce, Landing Pages).
Terms.section2_li4: Each project is governed by a specific Commercial Proposal which prevails over these terms in case of conflict.
Terms.section3_text: All website content (texts, images, source code, logos) is the exclusive property of Websites Algarve or third parties who authorized its use, protected by Copyright legislation. Reproduction without prior authorization is prohibited.
Terms.section4_text: The Client commits to providing truthful information and not using services for illicit purposes. Websites Algarve reserves the right to suspend services if abusive or illegal use is detected.
Terms.section5_text: Websites Algarve makes every effort to ensure continuous service availability but cannot be held liable for third-party failures (e.g., global servers, internet outages) or force majeure.
Terms.section6_text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Portuguese Law. For the resolution of disputes arising from this contract, the court of the District of Faro is competent, with express waiver of any other.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: Total transparency about tracking technologies used to improve your experience.
Cookies.section1_text: Cookies are small data files stored on your device that allow 'remembering' your preferences and analyzing your interaction with the site. They do not contain malware nor execute programs.
Cookies.section2_text: When visiting our site for the first time, a cookie management panel is displayed. You can accept all, reject non-essentials, or configure your preferences granularly. You can change these settings at any time in your browser settings.
Cookies.section3_text: We use different typologies of cookies for distinct purposes:
Cookies.cookie1_desc: Stores your choice regarding cookie acceptance/rejection, preventing the notice from appearing repeatedly.
Cookies.cookie2_desc: Keeps your language session active to ensure you see content in the correct language.
Cookies.cookie3_desc: Distinguishes unique users to generate anonymous website usage statistics.
